file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/README ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/README ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug_307_a.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_307_a.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug_307_a.cir.sh ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_307_a.cir.sh ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_307_a.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug_307_d.cir.sh ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_307_d.cir.sh ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_307_d.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug_307_d.cir.tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_307_d.cir.tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)

if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_307/bug_307_d.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bug_307_d.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug_307_d.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_307/bug_307_d.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_307/bug_307_d.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_307/bug_307_d.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bug_307_d.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce>" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug_307_d.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_307/bug_307_d.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_307/bug_307_d.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly")
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND BASH_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_307/bug_307_a.cir.sh COMMAND bash bug_307_a.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug_307_a.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_307/bug_307_a.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_307/bug_307_a.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly")
endif()
